title: Kuroshitsuji Picture Drama
synopsis: It is almost Valentine's Day, and grim reaper Grell Sutcliff finally receives the opportunity to become the heroine of her very own harem battle. Whilst making chocolates for the demonic butler Sebastian Michaelis, Grell's preparations are interrupted by a whole host of handsome men smashing through the window.
characters: ['Michaelis, Sebastian', 'Sutcliff, Grell', 'Undertaker', 'Finnian', 'Spears, William T.', 'Asman Kadar, Soma', 'Lau', 'Agni', 'Baldroy', 'Chamber, Aleister']
